description: Returns a paginated list of rulesets for the specified list of Glue tables.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The filter criteria. Name (string) --- The name of the ruleset filter criteria. Description (string) --- The description of the ruleset filter criteria. CreatedBefore (datetime) --- Filter on rulesets created before this date. CreatedAfter (datetime) --- Filter on rulesets created after this date. LastModifiedBefore (datetime) --- Filter on rulesets last modified before this date. LastModifiedAfter (datetime) --- Filter on rulesets last modified after this date. TargetTable (dict) --- The name and database name of the target table. The name of the Glue table. The name of the database where the Glue table exists. CatalogId (string) --- The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the ruleset filter criteria.

nested_params.name: Description
nested_params.description: The description of the ruleset filter criteria.

nested_params.name: CreatedBefore
nested_params.description: Filter on rulesets created before this date.

nested_params.name: CreatedAfter
nested_params.description: Filter on rulesets created after this date.

nested_params.name: LastModifiedBefore
nested_params.description: Filter on rulesets last modified before this date.

nested_params.name: LastModifiedAfter
nested_params.description: Filter on rulesets last modified after this date.

nested_params.name: TargetTable
nested_params.description: The name and database name of the target table.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the Glue table.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the database where the Glue table exists.

nested_params.name: CatalogId
nested_params.description: The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pair tags. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Rulesets
nested_items.description: A paginated list of rulesets for the specified list of Glue tables.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality ruleset.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the data quality ruleset.

nested_items.name: CreatedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time the data quality ruleset was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time the data quality ruleset was last modified.

nested_items.name: TargetTable
nested_items.description: An object representing an Glue table.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the Glue table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database where the Glue table exists.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

nested_items.name: RecommendationRunId
nested_items.description: When a ruleset was created from a recommendation run, this run ID is generated to link the two together.

nested_items.name: RuleCount
nested_items.description: The number of rules in the ruleset.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token, if more results are available.
